description:
A trip to Rika`s hometown reveals more about her than Yuta had anticipated.  Dekomori continues her antics against her nemesis "Mori-Summer".  Yuta and Rika escape the house in search of the Invisible Boundary Line, and end up in a place Rika holds dear to her heart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 追憶の...楽園喪失[パラダイス・ロスト]
